title: Simulation-Based Training for Boredom Management Strategies in Second Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental understanding of learning motivation management
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations, providing real-time feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more situations that induce boredom in simulation environments and implement coping strategies.
Learners can explain how boredom affects language acquisition (e.g., reduced concentration, impaired memory retention) through VR scenarios.
Learners can analyze causes and impacts of boredom experienced during learning using self-assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
